test - package test

test the board size with a numeric input as well as test the size of the squares array after the initiallization of the squares.

Test the die such that no result is > 6 and < 1

Test for final string when game ends
testGameEndSquare() - Method in class test.GameTest
Test such that there is one player on the last square when the game ended

test lower limit of boardsize input
testInputBoardsizeOver() - Method in class test.GameTest
test upper limit of boardsize input
testInputPlayerAmountLower() - Method in class test.PlayerSetupTest
testing the lower limit of the amount of players
testInputPlayerAmountUpper() - Method in class test.PlayerSetupTest
testing the upper limit of the amount of players
testLadderPositions() - Method in class test.BoardTest
Test positions of ladders (the positions are fixed according to the boardsize) every 5th starting from 1
testPlayerFinishExact() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Let a player finish exaclty and test his position
testPlayerFinishOver() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Let a player finish with overhead, position should still be on end field
testPlayerName() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Test whether the input name is actually set, also test for empty string
testPlayersSamePosition() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Test case when a player moves to a field which is occupied, should return to start
testSnakePositions() - Method in class test.BoardTest
Test positions of snakes (the positions are fixed according to the boardsize) every 5th starting from 5, while the last square can neither be a ladder nor a square
testSquareOccupied() - Method in class test.BoardTest
Test if the getOccupied method is working correctly with Laddder and Snake Cases
testTakeTurn() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Let on player move by rolling the die, after both players have been set on the same position Afterwards their position should not be equal
testUpdatePositionCase() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
Test if a player behaves correctly when encountering a ladder or a snake, test method getPosition Test getEnd method of Snake and Ladder
